FuncDef: This command configures a source IPv6 address range to be used as an SAP QoS policy match criterion.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv6 prefix for the IP match criterion in hex digits. Values-ipv6-address: x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces)
x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d
x: [0 to FFFF]H
d: [0 to 255]D.
Specifies the IPv6 prefix length for the ipv6-address expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 128.
Specifies the eight 16-bit hexadecimal pieces representing bit match criteria. Values-x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces).
